alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 1:20PM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the High Wind Warning, from 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing snow are possible.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
